name: illinoisan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Illinois: He is the fifth Illinoisan to serve in a Senate party leadership post. These issues are important to Illinoisans.
More examplesFewer examplesNine in ten Illinoisans are engaged in some sort of civic involvement.I want Illinoisans to know that we are constantly reviewing our safety measures. The oldest Illinoisan killed in the war was 59.
